mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, password, email, nickname, img) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT user_seq as userSeq, id, password, email, nickname, img FROM user
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq} AND password=#{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image (mimetype, original_name, data) VALUES(#{mimetype}, #{original_name}, #{data})
